availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Meredith Farris and Emily Farris. Resident of Taylor County in 1860. Served in the 13th Kentucky Infantry from December 30, 1861 to January 12, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 398.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, p. 533.
Find A Grave, "Samuel R. Farris (December 4, 1827-November 13, 1908)," Memorial #48173330, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/48173330 (accessed January 28, 2019).
